SEARCH
Package main.models

Class Transaction

java.lang.Object
main.models.Coin
main.models.Transaction
Direct Known Subclasses:
Block
public class Transaction extends Coin
The Transaction class represents a single transaction in a blockchain network. It extends the Coin class and adds the functionality to store input and output coins for a transaction. A transaction can be either a coinbase transaction or a regular transaction. For a coinbase transaction, the constructor generates a random amount and sets the input to an empty list. For a regular transaction, the constructor takes a list of input coins, output address and amount, and sets the input and output lists accordingly.
